page.title: 20Yaxham Domesday Credits
page.content:
Once the Headteacher had sold the idea to the children they set to work with great enthusiasm to find out more about their home area! Parents and friends have been of enormous help in getting it done in time. The children who did the research and much of the typing in of data were:
Christopher Bales Kate Bennett Rachel Bennett Paul Betts Matthew Bolton Anne-Marie Cushing Lisa Etheridge Sonia Garner Susan Gogle Steven Gore Daniel Hambrook Daniel Hull Stuart Hood Louise Hoyle Natasha Kirk Rachel Last Simon Pendergrest Jeremy Potter Denese Turner Juanita Zsiros
With a little help from Mr.T.Q.Green.
